Class DBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.DBConnection

extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getDatesForTopic

        public java.util.ArrayList<NewsModel> getDatesForTopic​(java.lang.String topic)
                                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets dates on which a specific topic appeared in the news portals and their occurrence.
        Parameters:
        topic - A string representing the topic of the news, e.g. "police" or "flood"
        Returns:
        Returns a list of NewsModel with specific dates and occurrence of the topic.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getNewsReportFromDate

        public java.util.ArrayList<NewsModel> getNewsReportFromDate​(int year,
                                                            int month,
                                                            int day)
                                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets top five news that appeared in news portals on a specific date.
        Parameters:
        year - Year (int) of the date that we're searching on.
        month - Month (int) of the date that we're searching on.
        day - Day (int) of the date that we're searching on.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of NewsModel. The select procedure return the top 5 results by default.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
